abstract: The PNC Financial Services Group, one of the largest regional banks, said late Tuesday that it would pay back $7.6 billion in government bailout money to the Treasury Department.
snippet: The PNC Financial Services Group, one of the largest regional banks, said late Tuesday that it would pay back $7.6 billion in government bailout money to the Treasury Department.
lead_paragraph: The PNC Financial Services Group, one of the largest regional banks, said late Tuesday that it would pay back $7.6 billion in government bailout money to the Treasury Department.

headline.main: PNC to Repay TARP Money After Sale of Unit
